text: The Thurston High School shooting was a mass shooting that happened on Thurston High School in Springfield, Oregon on May 21, 1998. The shooter, 15-year old Kip Kinkel, had killed both of his parents earlier in their house. He then killed 2 students at his school before being arrested. This shooting, along with the 1992 Lindhurst High School shooting and the 1974 Olean High School shooting, were the worst high school shootings in modern American history before the Columbine High School massacre. It remained the worst school shooting in Oregonian history before the 2015 Umpqua Community College shooting. ==References== Category:1998 in the United States Category:20th century in Oregon Category:1990s murders in the United States Category:Mass shootings in the 1990s Category:High school shootings in the United States Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the 1990s Category:May events
title: 1998 Thurston High School shooting
